表單設計_簽核流程新版本手動更新.Frm_ModalFlowUpgrateDes: The "Approval Process" has a new version. For a better experience, please upgrade to the latest version.
表單設計器_欄位設計_邏輯互動_備註.Frm_LogicNote:
Supports logical interactions between form fields, allowing certain form actions to be triggered when specific conditions are met for certain fields.
 A common example: When Field A (primary influencer) selects a particular option, Field B (affected field) will only show or hide.
 The settings here take priority over the default in "Field Arrangement.
表單設計器_邏輯互動_Modal備註.Frm_ModalLogicNote: Scenario example: When Field A (primary influencer) selects a certain option, Field B (affected field) will only show or hide.
表單設計器_邏輯互動.Frm_ModalLogicCondition: The following conditions must be met
表單設計器_邏輯互動.Frm_ModalLogicElse: When the above conditions are not met, then
表單設計器_邏輯互動_Condition第二欄位.Frm_ConditionGr: is Greater than or equal to
表單設計器_邏輯互動_Condition第二欄位.Frm_ConditionLe: is Less than or equal to
簽核流程視圖版_置底提示訊息窗.Frm_FlowTooltipDefault: Click on the step and complete the settings in the "Settings" section on the right; if you need to add the next step, click the "+" button or right-click to add the approval step. If the approval process settings are completed, save and publish.
簽核流程視圖版_Error.Frm_FlowErrorNoSource: There must be at least one source connection
簽核流程視圖版_置底提示訊息窗.Frm_FlowTooltipNoSource: There are unconnected steps; there must be at least one source connection. Please drag and connect the line from the red dot to the source step.
簽核流程視圖版_置底提示訊息窗.Frm_FlowTooltipFieldInco: There are incomplete fields. Please complete the step settings in the "Settings" section on the right.
簽核流程視圖版_置底提示訊息窗.Frm_FlowTooltipBulkDelet: Multiple steps can be selected and batch deleted using the delete button at the top right.
簽核流程視圖版_置底提示訊息窗.Frm_FlowTooltipAddNext: To add the next step, click the "+" button or right-click to add the approval step.
簽核流程 右方設定_指定人員.Frm_FlowDesigneeNote: If the selection needs to be made by the applicant when filling out the form, create a 'personnel selection' field component in the form design, and then specify it here
簽核流程 右方設定.Frm_FlowApprovalStillSign: If the approver is the applicant, is their approval required?
簽核流程 右方設定_指定群組.Frm_FlowGroupApprovalStil: Yes, both the applicant and others in the group can approve.
No, others in the group do not need to approve either.
The applicant cannot approve; approval must be done by someone else in the group.
簽核流程 右方設定_指定群組.Frm_FlowGroupMembers: Group members (if multiple, any one can approve).
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowMoreScenarios{{$n: There are {{$n}} more scenarios. Please check the settings on the right.
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgNote: Approval can be set based on the applicant's department level.
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgCondRequiremen: Does the hierarchical approval require conditions?
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgUpwardOption1: Based on the person's direct supervisor
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgUpwardOption2: Based on the upper-level unit of the department. If the unit has multiple main supervisors, parallel approval (any one agrees) will be used.
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgCondNoScenario: If there are no conditional scenarios
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgCondDefaultDes: To sign off with the direct supervisor, please enter "1"
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgCondNote1: 1. Please first go to "Field Design" to create the form fields before setting the relevant conditions here.
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgCondNote2: 2. If there is a conflict between scenarios or conditions, the highest-priority setting will prevail. For example, Scenario 1 > Scenario 2....
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgHighestLevelDe: If the initial approval after submission exceeds the highest approval level
簽核流程 右方設定_組織層級.Frm_FlowOrgHighestLevelOp: Scenario explanation: The applicant's unit level is N, and the set maximum approval level is lower than N. Example: The applicant's unit level is departmental, and the maximum approval level is set to divisional. (Department > Division)
No approval needed (directly proceed to the next stage)
表單設計器_簽核流程 右方設定_指定單位.Frm_FlowDUMembers: Personnel within the role (If there are multiple people, any one must approve)

簽核流程視圖版_Error.Frm_FlowErrorNoEnd: Unable to find the next connected step, please connect to another step or end the process
簽核流程 右方設定_指定單位.Frm_FlowDesignatedUnitNot: If the applicant needs to determine the approver when filling out the form, first create a 'Department Selection' field component in the form design and set it as mandatory. This will allow the approver to be specified here.

表單設計器_簽核流程 右方設定_依表單欄位.Frm_FlowAllApprova: All Approval: requires all individuals to approve

權限>表單設計權限設定.Frm_SetFormCreatorDes1: 1. MAYO Form Administrator has the highest management authority over all forms. To add or adjust personnel, please go to the Apollo HR system.
權限>表單設計權限設定.Frm_SetFormCreatorDes2: 2. Form Creator: The MAYO Form Administrator can assign personnel as Form Creators. The assigned personnel can create custom forms and automatically inherit the highest privileges for that form, becoming the Form Owner.
權限>表單設計權限設定.Frm_SetFormCreatorDes3: 3. If the Form Owner field in the Form Owner list is blank, it means the form was created by the MAYO Form Administrator.
權限>表單設計權限設定.Frm_WhoCanCreateForm: Who can create a form on the "Custom Forms" list page?

權限>權限角色設定(一般頁面).Frm_EnterFormNameCode: Enter Form Name or Form Code
權限>權限角色設定(一般頁面).Frm_FormAdminDes: The MAYO Form Administrator has default highest permissions. To add or adjust personnel, please go to the Apollo HR system.
權限>權限角色設定(一般頁面).Frm_ManageFormRecordsAnd: Form Record Management (Approval Progress) / Exception Form Management

Error Message.Frm_ErrorPageNotWorking: This page is not working properly. Please refresh the page later or go back to the previous page.
Error Message.Frm_ErrorPageDataNotFound: Cannot find the page/data you're looking for.
Error Message.Frm_ErrorInsufficientPermi: Insufficient permissions, you will be redirected to the form application list page.
簽核中可加簽.Frm_AddApproverAction: In the approval process, the current approver is allowed to add the following procedures:
簽核中可加簽.Frm_AllowParallelAddition: Allow "Add Signature in Parallel" (requires all individuals to sign, so if there are multiple people in this stage, it is not supported)
簽核中可加簽.Frm_ModalUnableToAddApproverDes: Not the current approver, may have been reassigned, or another person has already completed approval.
簽核中可加簽.Frm_ModalForward Addition success: One level has been added forward, you are no longer the current approver and will be redirected to the "Pending Approval Form" list page.
簽核中可加簽.Frm_ModalBackward Addition succes: One level has been added backward, you may continue the approval process.
簽核中可加簽.Frm_ModalParallel Addition succes: One level has been added in parallel, you may continue the approval process.
表單設計器_欄位設計_控件屬性_按鈕.Frm_Preview: You can preview the style effect
按鈕控件提醒通知Modal.Frm_ModalExternalLinkAlert: Reminder: You are about to open the following link
This link will open in a new tab, and your current page will remain unaffected. Do you wish to open this link?
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_AutoApprovalSettingsDes1: If an approver holds multiple roles in the same approval process (e.g., serving as a manager of multiple departments or as both a manager and a proxy), and if not selected, the default is "No merging of approvals allowed," meaning the approver must sign at each stage.
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_AutoApprovalSettingsDes2: If the same approver appears multiple times in the process:
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_MergeSameStages: Sequential or Same Stage Merged Approval:
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_MergeSameStagesDes: If the same approver appears in both the previous and next stages, the system will automatically approve the next stage. In processes where all approvers are required to sign, the system will merge duplicate stages, allowing the approver to sign only once.
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_AllowMergingAcrossStages: Allow Merging of Approvals Across Stages:
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_MergeIntoFirstStageDes: If the approver has already signed in the first stage, the system will automatically approve any subsequent duplicate stages, meaning the entire approval process requires only one signature.
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_MergeIntoLastStageDes: The system will automatically approve any previously duplicated stages, and the approver only needs to sign in the last stage, meaning the entire approval process requires only one signature.
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_ParallelAdditionDes: If the current stage is a parallel approval (anyone can sign), "parallel addition" will not be available.
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_AllowRejectionDes: If the approver in that stage "rejects," the request can be returned to any previous stage, allowing previously approved approvers to re-sign.
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_ReturnToAllApprovers: Return to the previously approved approvers.
表單設計器_簽核規則.Frm_ReturnSpecifiedStage: Return to the stage as specified by the approver.
表單設計器_欄位設計_控件_表格.Frm_TableInitNote: Dynamic data source, cannot be viewed.
簽核流程_指定單位_依表單欄位.Frm_FlowApprovalSeqNoteD: If multiple designated units are assigned, then:
簽核流程_指定單位_依表單欄位.Frm_FlowPositionOrderDU: Approvals follow the selected unit order, and any member within a unit can approve.
簽核流程_指定單位_依表單欄位.Frm_FlowAllApprovalDU: Only one unit is required to approve, and any member within the unit can approve.
簽核流程_指定單位_依表單欄位.Frm_FlowAnyOneApprovalDU: All units must approve, and any member within a unit can approve.
表單設計器_欄位設計_控件屬性(Grid).Frm_DynamicListSet: Set between 0 and 100. To disable additions, set it to "0." It’s recommended to set a default value (see "Field Settings").
表單設計器_欄位設計_控件屬性(檔案上傳).Frm_UploadFailedEr: Do not manually change the file extension. Please upload a valid file extension.
表單紀錄管理_表單資料_匯出欄位設定.Frm_ExportFieldSettin: Select the fields you want to export. To change the order, simply rearrange them below.
Error Handle.Frm_ErrorNoPermissionTitle: The page cannot be accessed by non-applicants or current approvers.
表單非同步訊息.Frm_InProgressDes: The process analysis is still being handled. Please return to the form tracking list first.
表單非同步訊息.Frm_SubmissionErrorDes: An error has occurred in the system and will be processed as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact customer service.
表單設計器：送簽後欄位配置.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsDe: Set 'Display' and 'Editable' fields during and after approval.
表單設計器：送簽後欄位配置.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsSe: If not using the default, additional configuration is required.
表單設計器：送簽後欄位配置.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsNo: 1. Originally, in [Field Design > Field Arrangement], only the fields that the applicant can "display" and "edit" while filling out the form could be set. Here, you can configure the field settings after the form has been submitted for approval.
In Approval Process: Refers to the situation when the approver is actively reviewing and processing the form as part of the approval workflow.
Post-Approval Tracking (including process completion): Refers to the situation when the approver has completed the review, and the form is being viewed in [Form Tracking > My Approved Forms].

Default Value: "Display" is set according to the default properties of the designer controls; "Editable" is by default set to non-editable fields. Clicking "Restore Defaults" will return the settings to the initial state.

In Approval Process: Refers to the situation when the applicant has submitted the form for approval and the current approver happens to be the applicant, or an additional approver is assigned to the applicant (for example, to return the form to the applicant for supplementary materials).
Post-Approval Tracking (including process completion): Refers to the situation when the applicant views the form after the process is complete in [Form Tracking > My Submitted Forms].
權限.Frm_TooltipNoPermission: No permission, please contact the administrator
導入/匯出表單.Frm_ErrorImportFailedUploadValid: Please upload a valid JSON file.
導入/匯出表單.Frm_ErrorImportFailedFormLimit{{: Current form limit: {{$n}} forms. No more can be added. If you need to increase this limit, please contact customer support.
自定義表單範本庫.Frm_CustomTemplatesNote1: 1. Custom form templates do not have data integration functionality. The data filled in by the applicant will not be written back to the Apollo HR system.
自定義表單範本庫.Frm_CustomTemplatesNote2: 2. After selecting 'Apply,' the template will be copied to the 'Custom Forms' list page. Even if the template is updated later, the version of the applied form will not be updated synchronously.
自定義表單範本庫.Frm_ErrorUploadFailedInvalidFor: Format mismatch. Please upload a form design in JSON format supported by MAYO Form.
表單設計器：送簽後欄位配置.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsSe: Switching back to the default will clear any custom configurations. Are you sure you want to revert to the default?
Grid打包下載無法連續下載.Frm_NODLConsecutively: You cannot download consecutively within a short period, please try again later.
公用_網路連線有問題.Frm_NetworkIssueDes: Please check if your network connection is working properly, or try again later.
權限角色設定(一般頁面).Frm_RoleCodeErrorMsg: Limited to alphanumeric characters, 50 characters max
Error.Frm_ErrorClientSideTimeOutDes: Connection failed, please check your network or try again later.
原單起撤銷單.Frm_AllowApplicantWithdrawDes: After the form is approved, the applicant can request a "withdrawal".
原單起撤銷單.Frm_SameAsOriginalProcess: Same as original approval process (standard process)
原單起撤銷單.Frm_CopyForwardProcess: Copy and apply from standard process
表單設計器：Data Source 配置介面.Frm_BeforeDeliver: Used for validation before applicant withdrawal or approver's agreement/approval

原單起撤銷單.Frm_ModalCopyForwardProcessTitle: Please confirm if you want to copy and apply.
原單起撤銷單.Frm_ModalCopyForwardProcessDes: This action cannot be undone, do you want to continue?
表單設計器：Data Source 配置介面.Frm_OnFormInitDes: Pre-design fields in the form designer and load data from external sources during initialization.
表單設計器：人員選擇控件，預設人員參數擴充​.Frm_EmpDefaultAll: If no pre-fill is required, you can leave it blank.
表單設計器：日期時間/起迄控件，限制日期範圍.Frm_ErrorDataStar: Date must be on or before {{$n}}
表單設計器：日期時間/起迄控件，限制日期範圍.Frm_ErrorDataEndL: Date must be on or after {{$n}}

表單設計器：Data Source 配置介面.Frm_AfterFormInit: Fields are dynamically generated and data is loaded based on the API response.

表單設計器：Data Source 配置介面.Frm_ReFormInitDes: When the form is withdrawn and resubmitted, it connects to external data sources to load and set the data during form initialization.
